name: Mass Warfare
description:
Controls

  • Mouse - move cursor
  • LMC - Select
  • RMC - Attack
  • A - Select all
  • R - Rotate ship building type
  • Manual mode: use up/down to zoom in/out.

This game was made by @josefnpat for the February 2015 OneGameAMonth challenge.

Changelog:

v34

  • Added F11 for fullscreen
  • Fixing xbox 360 xinput on win 8 input
  • Disabling vsync
  • Topsy Turney'd the changelog

v31

  • Fixing keyboard enable/disable
  • Changing save directory
  • Adding support for:
    • XBOX 360 controllers (wireless on dongle/xinput/wired)
    • OUYA (Linux Only)
    • PS3

v28

  • Allow up to 8 players
  • Allow 0 human players
  • Colors shuffle on game start
  • All ships have been reskinned as two races, four colors each with four classes each.

v27

  • Fixes the zoom bug
  • Added a manual camera
  • Show what player won at the end
  • Adding title for non-fullscreen.

v23

  • Window is now fully resizable
  • Added rally points

v21

  • Initial release
